eventManagment.views module

This module contains several view classes for the eventmanagement app. class:UserListEvents: A viewset for retrieving all user events by user id. class:UserListPastEvents: A viewset for retrieving all user past events by user id. class:UserListEvents: A viewset for retrieving all user upcoming events by user id.

class eventManagment.views.UserListEvents(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: ListAPIView

A viewset for retrieving all user events by user id.
